ComicInfo.Summary:
Conan leads a team of Savage Avengers against an Asgardian dragon in a quest for treasure. Get out your twenty-sided dice and roll to attack with Conan, Magik and new Savage recruits the Black Knight and Juggernaut!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------|---------------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Valerio Giangiordano & Frank D'Armata | 1 | | Var | Variant Cover | Marco Checchetto | 2 |
ComicInfo.Tags: Vermin,Sadurang,Magik,Savage Avengers,Dragons,Tombstone,Black Knight,Fly,Man-Bull,Bar With No Name,Conan,Basilisk,Juggernaut
ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Fourteen: Enter the Dragon
